lines.text: I'm drenched to the skin. I guess I'll have to take everything off.
You wanna borrow some clothes?
Nah. I'll rough it for awhile.
You know, ever since I been workin' out, I wake up every morning with a rock hard-on. This morning, I had to jack off in the john just to get it to go down.
Sounds like a waste. I mean, uh, I see all the girls you're with. Shit, you have your pick.
Shit, most of 'em can't even take it. The ones that can ain't really my type. They just want to play with it, hold it, look at it.
You outta get out of them wet underwear, don't you think?
Well, if you took yours off too, I'd feel a lot more comfortable. You know?
Sure. I know what chu mean.

We know that your king has promised you great power and riches. He has done this because, uh... shall we say, he has grown especially fond of you. Because of the... "favors" you bestow upon him, a great closeness now exists between you.
He IS my good friend. That is true.
That is why we come to you, to ask that you use your influence to persuade the king that we have come in peace.
We want to see an end to this fighting.
An honorable request, but I do not consider that I bestow favors upon the king. It is he who pleases me.
We come in peace.

[grasping his hookah]
Then we will smoke, and I will consider your request.
Would you grant me the favor, as my king does?

[surprised by the request but, for the sake of peace... ]
Yes.
Let us begin.
[after smoking on the soldiers awhile, the King's Favorite addresses the Lieutenant]
You must now give favor to your friend.
[the captain looks with alarm at his lieutenant; the lieutenant seems more than a little willing to do his duty on a superior for peace]
Yeah, suck my cock. Oh, yeah, lick my balls, come on.
Get up, white man. Put this big red cock in your mouth.
Yeah, take it, white man. Yeah, suck this warrior's big cock.
Work, white man, work!
Come on, get 'em off. Yeah, get those pants off and bend over.
Open that ass and let this big pole in.
